welcome.title: Welcome to your panel in Aura
welcome.subtitle: We're glad to have you here.
welcome.description: With Aura you can manage and automate the interaction of your Instagram accounts, discover key trends in vacancies, events and meetings, automatically respond to your clients with Neto our chatbot, and get a clear view of your digital impact. You can also schedule posts, analyze your follower growth, receive smart alerts, and much more. All from one place: simple, agile and secure. Start exploring and take your digital presence to the next level!
welcome.shortPhrase1: Let Neto work for you ðŸ˜‰
welcome.shortPhrase3: One panel, all your accounts ðŸ”—
welcome.smartAutomationDesc: Set up automatic responses, manage alerts, and let Neto handle interactions for you.
welcome.trendsPanelDesc: Discover which topics generate the most impact in your posts and make decisions based on real-time data.
welcome.multiAccountDesc: Easily manage all your Instagram accounts from a single centralized panel.
welcome.dataAnalysisDesc: Explore your feed's performance: likes, comments, shares, and much more.
welcome.robotMessage: Welcome, I'm Neto and it will be a pleasure to help you
welcome.cta: Start personalizing your experience in Aura

autoResponses.title: Auto Responses
autoResponses.responsePlaceholder: Message the bot will send. You can use {user_name}, {link}, etc.
autoResponses.exampleResponse: Thank you for your interest in our vacancy!
